entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
